import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import "../styles/glossary7to9.css"; import BackArrow from "../images/icons/backArrow.svg"; import ForwardArrow from "../images/icons/forwardArrow.svg"; import Baby1card3 from "../images/individualSVGs/card3/baby1card3.svg"; import Baby2card3 from "../images/individualSVGs/card3/baby2card3.svg"; import Baby3card3 from "../images/individualSVGs/card3/baby3card3.svg"; import Hand1card3 from "../images/individualSVGs/card3/hand1card3.svg"; import Hand2card3 from "../images/individualSVGs/card3/hand2card3.svg"; import Hand3card3 from "../images/individualSVGs/card3/hand3card3.svg"; import Toy1card3 from "../images/individualSVGs/card3/toy1card3.svg"; import Toy2card3 from "../images/individualSVGs/card3/toy2card3.svg"; import Toy3card3 from "../images/individualSVGs/card3/toy3card3.svg"; import Toy4card3 from "../images/individualSVGs/card3/toy4card3.svg"; //7to9 months screenmode 6 (Glossary), glossarymode 3 class Glossary7to9 extends Component { render() { return ( <>
{ this.props.dispatch({ type: "SET_SCREEN_MODE", screenMode: 5, //glossary }); }} >

7-9 Months

{ this.props.dispatch({ type: "SET_GLOSSARY_MODE", glossaryMode: 2, //glossary4to6 }); }} src={ForwardArrow} alt="forward arrow" >

7 Months

Sitting

Transferring between hands

Egg shakers

Drum

{/* 7 months */}

8 Months

Crawling

Finger movement improving

Bar for pulling self to stand

{/* 8 months */}

9 months

Pulling up

Hand releasing

Object permanence box

{/* 9 months */}
); } } export default connect()(Glossary7to9);
